Posts.Content: Jul 1, 2012 07:25PM sugarlandIDC wrote: Hi Sunflower girl...no surgery yet. They are still staging me I already know that I am going to elect to have a bi-lateral mastectomy. Due to my medical history I'm just going to make it really difficult for this stuff to come back. It helped me to look at FINAL breast reconstruction photos after a bilateral mastectomy. I found resolve in that why the road may be a little long and definitely bumpy the final destination actually looked good.
Posts.Title: Any other newbies? cpp christina0001

Posts.Content: Jul 1, 2012 05:12PM sugarlandIDC wrote: Hi Sunflower girl....I was diagnosed on June 14 with IDC and DCIS in the left breast. It's at least stage 2 and I'm ER+PR+ HER2- I meet with the MDA oncologists soon to determine treatment. You are not alone in your anxiety. :(
